name: Test remove product from shopping cart
description: Verify remove product from shopping cart

steps.name: Find product and add to shopping cart

parameters.name: element
parameters.value: [[ChromeDriver: chrome on WINDOWS (b55d89e584dabf8fd86ed027857abff8)] -> css selector: [data-testid="plp-product-grid-item"]:first-child h2 a]

parameters.name: element
parameters.value: [[ChromeDriver: chrome on WINDOWS (b55d89e584dabf8fd86ed027857abff8)] -> css selector: li[class="InStock"] a[class="dk_dropdown_option"]]

parameters.name: element
parameters.value: [[ChromeDriver: chrome on WINDOWS (b55d89e584dabf8fd86ed027857abff8)] -> css selector: [class="AddToBag"] a]

parameters.name: element
parameters.value: [[ChromeDriver: chrome on WINDOWS (b55d89e584dabf8fd86ed027857abff8)] -> css selector: button[data-ga-v2="Shopping bag"]]

parameters.name: element
parameters.value: [[ChromeDriver: chrome on WINDOWS (b55d89e584dabf8fd86ed027857abff8)] -> css selector: [data-ga-v3="View Bag"]]

parameters.name: element
parameters.value: [[ChromeDriver: chrome on WINDOWS (b55d89e584dabf8fd86ed027857abff8)] -> css selector: a[title="Click to remove this item"]]

steps.name: Verify message is equal to: your bag contains 0 item and comes to a total of ₪ 0.00.

parameters.name: element
parameters.value: [[ChromeDriver: chrome on WINDOWS (b55d89e584dabf8fd86ed027857abff8)] -> css selector: [id="title"] p]

parameters.name: msg
parameters.value: your bag contains 0 item and comes to a total of ₪ 0.00.
